```{r}
data("early_january_weather")
```

```{r}
library(tibble)
```

The variable names in this dataset are `r names(early_january_weather)`.
The dataset has `r nrow(early_january_weather)` observations and `r ncol(early_january_weather)` variables.
The mean of the temperature in the dataset is `r mean(pull(early_january_weather, temp))`.

```{r}
    ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x=time_hour, y=temp, color=humid)) + geom_point()
  
```
